title: Thunder Mountain cinema slide
creator_credit: David Howard and Fox Film Corporation
credit_line: ACMI has endeavoured to contact the owners of these objects since their deposit in 2015. Unfortunately this has been unsuccessful. We would welcome any information to identify the owners.
brief_description: Two glass sheets: one glass only and the other with slide imagery which has a monochromatic emulsion that has then been hand painted with coloured pigments or dye. TEXT on the slide reads: Red-blooded adventure and colourful romance in this zane grey thrilling story of the west. George O’Brien in Thunder Mountain with Barbara Fritchie Frances Grant for general admission
